title: Oil spills - worldwide
summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Oil Spill Event, and Amount of leaked oil (in tons) in each Oil Spill Event on the y axis.

The maximum Amount of leaked oil (in tons) 1000000.0 is found at Oil Spill Event Itox Uno (Gulf of Mexico 1979 oil rig) and the minimum is found at Erika (Atlantic 1999 tanker) where Amount of leaked oil (in tons) is 20000.0.
There is a difference of 980000.0 between the maximum Oil Spill Event Itox Uno (Gulf of Mexico 1979 oil rig) and minimum Oil Spill Event Erika (Atlantic 1999 tanker).
